creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: three panel rectangle of indigo dyed cotton bound on three sides with tan tape; 4" top band stitched to main band, except for 4-1/2" on sides, is red with black appliqued scroll; center has 12" appliqued square with large design in blue, red and green
title: Baby Carrier
